mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_camera tc WHERE tc.`status` = 0

SELECT ta.area_name, IFNULL(p.`count`, 0) AS pcount FROM t_camera tc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT camera_id, COUNT(1) AS `count` FROM t_itf_vehicle tif WHERE tif.category =1 GROUP BY tif.camera_id) p ON tc.camera_id = p.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON ts.site_id = tc.site_id LEFT JOIN t_area ta ON ta.area_id = ts.area_id ORDER BY p.`count` DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT ts.site_name, IFNULL(p.`count`, 0) AS pcount FROM t_camera tc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT camera_id, COUNT(1) AS `count` FROM t_itf_vehicle tif
GROUP BY tif.camera_id ) p ON tc.camera_id = p.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON ts.site_id = tc.site_id ORDER BY p.`count` DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 10) AS createTime, COUNT(1) as `count` FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{startTime} AND #{endTime} > tiv.occur_time GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 10) ORDER BY SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 10) DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_itf_vehicle WHERE occur_time LIKE CONCAT(#{date}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_itf_vehicle tif WHERE tif.occur_time >= #{startTime} AND #{endTime} >= tif.occur_time
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_itf_vehicle tif WHERE tif.occur_time LIKE #{month}

SELECT SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 7) AS createTime, COUNT(1) AS `count` FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv WHERE SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 4) =#{year} GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 7) ORDER BY SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 7)

SELECT ts.site_name, COUNT(1) AS `count` FROM t_violation tv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tc.camera_id = tv.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON ts.site_id = tc.site_id GROUP BY ts.site_id ORDER BY COUNT(1) DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT tc.camera_code, ts.site_name, CONCAT(ts.lng, '|', ts.lat) AS coordinate FROM t_camera tc LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id
